markdown:
| icon           = poe2 scroll_of_wael icon.png
| description    = Most of this document is drafted in a careful, official hand. Another author appears to have made several hasty additions.

"To our valued customer,

On behalf of the dedicated staff of the Consignment and Salvage Clearinghouse, we would like to congratulate you on your recent purchase of (1 construct - salvaged, refurbished).

Per your contract with our licensed dealer, (Rimo Caldera, salvage marker 56221), payment of (trade goods and undisclosed services) has been accepted. We hope you are pleased with your order!

Sincerest regards, Rowen Gjakon, shipping quartermaster, CaSC

Dealer notes, if any:

(Patrol command unreliable) (Attack command unreliable) (Guard command unreliable) (See accompanying document for command words. Functionality highly dependent on pronunciation and emphasis. Good luck.)"
| added_in       = poe2
| equipment_slot = Unequippable
| item_type      = Quest item
| item_category  = Other item
| requirements   = 
| is_soulbound   = no
| is_unique      = no
| value          = 0
| range          = 
| level1_spells  = 
| level2_spells  =

| level8_spells  = 
| item_bonuses   = 
| enchantments   = 
| rel_quests     = Tip of the Spear
| rel_items      = Armor Invoice
| rel_abilities  = 
| rel_talents    = 
| internalname   = ITEM_QUEST_Construct_Scroll
| location       = * [Ori o Koīki Sanctum](/oriOKoikiSanctum/): Given to you by [Tangara](/tangara/) if you pass a Metaphysics 5 / Bluff 6 / Athletics 4 check, or simply pickpocketed from him.
| guid           =de42a096-0e2d-4041-b4dc-24e279b5544f
}}
'''{{Pagename nd}}''' is a {{lc:Quest item}} in {{poe2}}.

##  Description 

{{Description |{{#var:description}}}}

##  Acquisition 

{{#arraymap: {{#var:location}}|;|x|x|\n}}

## Usage

* Allows you to take control of the construct (with an additional [Metaphysics](/metaphysics/) 6 check), and order it to kill [Tangara](/tangara/), one of the targets of [Tip of the Spear](/tipOfTheSpear/).
